name: Dennis K. JOHNSONBAUGH, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Johnsonbaugh v. Department of Public Welfare

judges: NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: Dennis K. JOHNSONBAUGH, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of November, 1996, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted, limited to the issue of whether the unemployment compensation referee’s adjudication with respect to alleged patient abuse precludes the Department of Public Welfare from relitigating that issue before the Civil Service Commission.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Kenneth A. Wise, Harrisburg, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
685 A.2d 96
Dennis K. JOHNSONBAUGH, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 18, 1996.
Kenneth A. Wise, Harrisburg, for petitioner.
